member.name: M:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.#ctor
member.summary: Contains information about a check to be written to file.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.Amount
member.summary: The US dollar value of the check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageCreationDate
member.summary: Date assigned by the image creator for the image contained in BackImageData .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageDataB
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the back of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageData
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the back of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageFilename
member.summary: This property contains location of a scanned image of the back of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageReferenceKey
member.summary: A designator assigned by the ECE institution that uniquely identifies the BackImageData .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDAccountNumber
member.summary: A number that identifies the depository account at the Bank of First Deposit.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDBranch
member.summary: A code that identifies the branch at the Bank of First Deposit.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDConversionIndicator
member.summary: A code that indicates the conversion within the processing institution between original paper check, image, and IRD.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDRoutingNumber
member.summary: A number that identifies the Bank of First Deposit.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDTruncator
member.summary: Identifies if this BOFD is the truncator of the original check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.CanRecreateImages
member.summary: A code that indicates whether the sender has the ability to recreate the check images (from the original source) for the duration of the agreed to retention time frame.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageCreationDate
member.summary: Date assigned by the image creator for the image contained in FrontImageData .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageDataB
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the front of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageData
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the front of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageFilename
member.summary: This property contains location of a scanned image of the front of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageReferenceKey
member.summary: A designator assigned by the ECE institution that uniquely identifies the FrontImageData .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.ImageCompression
member.summary: A code that identifies the algorithm or method used to compress the images stored in the FrontImageData and BackImageData properties.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.ImageCreatorRoutingNumber
member.summary: A number that identifies the financial institution that created the image (if different from BOFDRoutingNumber ).

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.ImageFormat
member.summary: A code that identifies the type of image format used for the images contained in the FrontImageData and BackImageData properties.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.MICRAuxOnUs
member.summary: A code used on commercial checks at the discretion of the payor bank, read off of the MICR line on a check.

member.summary: Account number data specified by the payor bank and read from the MICR line on a check.

member.summary: The external processing code from the MICR line of a check, if present.

member.summary: Payor bank routing number, read from the MICR line of a check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.PayeeName
member.summary: The name of the payee from the check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.SequenceNumber
member.summary: ECE Institution Item Sequence Number, assigned by the institution that creates the file.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CCCard.Number
member.summary: Customer's credit card number for the transaction.

member.name: M:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.#ctor
member.summary: Contains the recurring payment schedule.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.EndDate
member.summary: The end date of the subscription.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.Frequency
member.summary: The frequency of payments.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.FrequencyUnit
member.summary: The unit of time to be used when calculating the frequency of payments.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.InitialAmount
member.summary: The initial amount to be charged (such as a trial period or setup fee).

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.RecurAmount
member.summary: The amount to be charged on a recurring basis.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.StartDate
member.summary: The date on which the recurring payments will start processing.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.TotalPayments
member.summary: The total number of payments.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPPaymentSchedule.TrialPayments
member.summary: The total number of trial payments.

member.name: M:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.#ctor
member.summary: Contains the response to the recurring transaction.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.ApprovalCode
member.summary: Contains an authorization code when a transaction has been approved.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.Approved
member.summary: Indicates the status of the last transaction.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.AVSResult
member.summary: Contains the Address Verification System result code.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.Code
member.summary: Indicates the status of the authorization request.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.CVVResult
member.summary: Contains the returned CVV2 result code if it was requested.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.Data
member.summary: The entire response returned from the gateway processor.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.ErrorCode
member.summary: Additional error code returned by some gateways.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.ErrorText
member.summary: Additional error description returned by some gateways.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.InvoiceNumber
member.summary: Invoice number submitted in authorization request (if applicable).

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.ProcessorCode
member.summary: Response code from the underlying processor.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.Text
member.summary: Text information that describes each response code.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.TransactionId
member.summary: Contains the Visa Transaction Identifier or MasterCard Reference Number.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPRecurringResponse.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Contains the Subscription or Profile Identifier for the recurring payment.

member.name: M:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.#ctor
member.summary: Contains the recurring subscription details.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.CardExpMonth
member.summary: The expiration month of the card currently being processed for the recurring payments.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.CardExpYear
member.summary: The expiration year of the card currently being processed for the recurring payments.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.CardNumber
member.summary: The card number currently being processed for the recurring payments.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.EndDate
member.summary: The date in which the recurring payments will stop processing.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.Frequency
member.summary: The frequency in which payments will occur.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.FrequencyUnit
member.summary: The unit frequency in which the payments will be processed.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.LastPaymentDate
member.summary: The date that the last/previous transaction was processed.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.NextPaymentDate
member.summary: The date of the next upcoming transaction.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.RecurAmount
member.summary: The amount being charged on a recurring basis.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.RemainingPayments
member.summary: The total number of remaining payments until the recurring payments will stop processing.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.StartDate
member.summary: The date in which the recurring payments started processing.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.Status
member.summary: The current status of the recurring subscription.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Contains the Subscription or Profile Identifier for the recurring payment.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.SubscriptionName
member.summary: Contains the name of the recurring subscription or profile.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.EPSubscriptionDetails.TotalPayments
member.summary: The total number of payments.
